revised_title: Landau-like Equation for Inhomogeneous Plasma Mixing
tldr: The article presents a study on the mixing of two plasmas using an inhomogeneous Landau-like equation. The author extends the methods developed for homogeneous problems to a simple inhomogeneous situation, considering a pseudo-cycle interaction involving an inhomogeneous wave vector and a homogeneous system. The analysis provides a more complex solution than the homogeneous case due to an additional singularity, but it can be used for larger values of than previous work.
